alert.note: Alert for Coastal Brazoria (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 05 at 6:14AM CST by NWS Houston - Galveston
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT WEST CENTRAL GALVESTON...EAST CENTRAL BRAZORIA AND SOUTHEASTERN HARRIS COUNTIES THROUGH 700 AM CST... At 613 AM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Angleton, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Southwestern League City, Alvin, Angleton, Dickinson, La Marque, Santa Fe, Hitchcock, Danbury, Holiday Lakes, Hillcrest, eastern Bailey`s Prairie, Liverpool, and Chocolate Bayou. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
